dcterms:creator: A. R. T. Lestari
R. S. Perdana
M. A. Fauzi
dcterms:description: The dataset consists of Twitter documents related to the 2017 Jakarta gubernatorial election, containing two types of sentiment: positive and negative, with an equal number of each type. The dataset underwent preprocessing steps including replacing emojis with special markers and removing stopwords.
dcterms:title: Sentiment dataset from the 2017 Jakarta gubernatorial election (Pilkada)

dcterms:creator: S. Thomas
et al.
dcterms:description: The validation dataset used to test the performance of the sentiment analysis model, derived from the 2017 Jakarta gubernatorial election.
dcterms:title: Validation dataset from the 2017 Jakarta Gubernatorial Election
